name: firebase-cli-emulator-race-condition-repro
description: Reproduction case for Firebase CLI emulator bug where Storage events get misrouted to Firestore handlers

scripts.teardown-emulators: pkill -f firebase && lsof -ti :8080 -ti :9229 -ti :4000 -ti :5001 | xargs kill || true
scripts.serve: npm run teardown-emulators && npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions,firestore,storage,auth --inspect-functions
